00234 struct DLL_PUBLIC scs_Id_t {

00291 enum AS_NodeService {
00292     IDS = 0,    
00293     NSS = 1,    
00294     // DDS and DUS not implemented in plugin
00295     // SCS n.a.
00296     // TIS supersed by TIS29
00297     // FLASH n.a.
00298     STS = 7,    
00299     // FSS n.a.
00300     // TCS n.a.
00301     // BSS n.a.
00302     // NIS superseded by NCS
00303     MIS = 12,   
00304     MCS = 13,   
00305     // CIS n.a.
00306 
00307     // User defined range starts here
00308     DRS = 100,  
00309     TIS29=101,  
00310     NCS = 102   
00311 };
